categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Foresight was a MC30c frigate used by the Rebel Alliance and the New Republic during the Galactic Civil War as a surveyor starship.

Assigned to Operation Flotsam, Foresight aided in the process of clearing battle sites of dangerous materials and exploring abandoned starships for valuable information. While attempting to recover artifacts from an Imperial hulk in 15 ABY, the cruiser's automatic firing sensors detected Foresight and fired upon it, destroying it.
